name: event-lambdas
description: Tooling for developing and running event lambdas

scripts.meetupcom:producer:update: cd meetupcom && serverless deploy function -f produce --aws-profile muxer
scripts.meetupcom:producer:invoke: cd meetupcom && serverless invoke -f produce -l --aws-profile muxer
scripts.meetupcom:producer:invoke-local: cd meetupcom && serverless invoke local -f produce
scripts.meetupcom:producer:logs: cd meetupcom && serverless logs -f produce -l --aws-profile muxer
scripts.meetupcom:transformer:update: cd meetupcom && serverless deploy function -f transform --aws-profile muxer
scripts.meetupcom:transformer:invoke: cd meetupcom && serverless invoke -f transform -l --aws-profile muxer
scripts.meetupcom:transformer:invoke-local: cd meetupcom && serverless invoke local -f transform
scripts.meetupcom:transformer:logs: cd meetupcom && serverless logs -f transform -l --aws-profile muxer

scripts.eventbrite:producer:invoke-local: cd eventbrite && serverless invoke local -f produce
scripts.eventbrite:producer:logs: cd eventbrite && serverless logs -f produce -l --aws-profile muxer
scripts.eventbrite:transformer:update: cd eventbrite && serverless deploy function -f transform --aws-profile muxer
scripts.eventbrite:transformer:invoke: cd eventbrite && serverless invoke -f transform -l --aws-profile muxer
scripts.eventbrite:transformer:invoke-local: cd eventbrite && serverless invoke local -f transform
scripts.eventbrite:transformer:logs: cd eventbrite && serverless logs -f transform -l --aws-profile muxer
